name: Blue Letters
description:
"I’m Dorette. Just your average girl you could find anywhere."

"This little guy here is Birb - I’ve been with him since I was a little kid."

"Currently, I’m working as a delivery girl for my father."

"Everything is peaceful here at the floating city of Azurite. A bit too peaceful, even…"

"Isn’t life supposed to be a bit more exciting?!"

"I wish I could go to other places out there! Dazzling forests, beautiful villages, I've seen them all from my picture books. There's all kinds of islands to visit!"

"Is there nothing I can do to change this…?"

.

.

Blue Letters is a 2D platformer game where the player controls a young postwoman trainee named Dorette who ventures through obstacles in the sky world to deliver mails and connect people.

Game Features

  • Glide through the sky with your cute and fluffy companion.
  • 24 platforming stages await to challenge you!
  • Discover new places and watch as Dorette grows up along her journey.




*Blue Letters supports both keyboard and controller.*

Run

Press left or right arrow key / Move left stick horizontally for controller

Controls the direction the character walks.

Jump

Press Z key / Press A button for controller

Jumps from the ground. You may hold the button after jumping to jump higher.

Glide

Hold Z key / Hold A button for controller

After a window after jumping, you can glide to slow down the descent speed.

Dash

Press X key / Press X button for joy controller

while holding down directional arrow keys to dash in a direction.

(Either on the ground and in mid-air)

(Each dash consumes 1 stamina point. Stamina points is restored when you land on the ground or touches a replenisher.)

The game is developed by students from Thailand studying at Thammasat University under the major of IDD-CDT.
